item.title: React: Mengubah Title Halaman Secara Dinamis
item.author: rajaazian08@gmail.com (Raja Azian)
item.description: Changing document title in pages that was built with React can be little bit tricky. Because, our working area only within <body></body> tag. Since React 16.8 we can built custom hook that can easly access the document.title and change the active page title.
